data.title: Elizabeth Cady Stanton Papers
data.meta_description: Selected Archival Collections For Library of Congress collections, please click on the catalog record links for a fuller description and additional links to available online finding aids, indexes, and digital collections.
data.text:
Related Resources

Selected Archival Collections

For Library of Congress collections, please click on the catalog record links for a fuller description and additional links to available online finding aids, indexes, and digital collections.

Susan B. Anthony Papers, Manuscript Division, Library of Congress. LC catalog record.

Elizabeth Cady Stanton Papers, Archives & Special Collections Library, Vassar College, Poughkeepsie, N.Y. Finding aid External.

The Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony [Microfilm Edition]. Wilmington, Del.: Scholarly Resources Inc., 1991. LC catalog record. See also Holland, Patricia G., and Ann D. Gordon, eds; Kathleen A. McDonough and Gail K. Malmgreen, associate editors. The Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony: Guide and Index to the Microfilm Edition. Wilmington, Del.: Scholarly Resources Inc., 1992. LC catalog record

Booker T. Washington Papers, Manuscript Division, Library of Congress. LC catalog record.

Anna Kelton Wiley Papers, Manuscript Division, Library of Congress. LC catalog record.

Selected Writings By or Associated with Elizabeth Cady Stanton

Anthony, Susan B., and Ida Husted Harper, eds. History of Woman Suffrage, Volume 4, 1883-1900. Rochester, N.Y.: Susan B. Anthony (Charles Mann Press), 1902. LC catalog record. New York: Arno Press, 1969. LC catalog record.

Blatch, Harriot Stanton, and Alma Lutz. Challenging Years: The Memoirs of Harriot Stanton Blatch. New York: G. P. Putnam's Sons, 1940. LC catalog record.

Buhle, Mari Jo, and Paul Buhle, eds. The Concise History of Woman Suffrage: Selections from the Classic Work of Stanton, Anthony, Gage, and Harper. Urbana: University of Illinois Press, 1978. LC catalog record; reprint 2005 LC catalog record.

DuBois, Ellen Carol, ed. The Elizabeth Cady Stanton-Susan B. Anthony Reader: Correspondence, Writings, Speeches. Boston: Northeastern University Press, 1992. LC catalog record.

Gordon, Ann D., ed. The Selected Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony, Volume I: In the School of Anti-Slavery, 1840-1866. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 1997. LC catalog record.

Gordon, Ann D., ed. The Selected Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony, Volume II: Against an Aristocracy of Sex, 1866-1873. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 2000. LC catalog record.

Gordon, Ann D., ed. The Selected Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony, Volume III: National Protection for National Citizens, 1873-1880. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 2003. LC catalog record.

Gordon, Ann D., ed. The Selected Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony, Volume IV: When Clowns Make Laws for Queens, 1880-1887. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 2006. LC catalog record.

Gordon, Ann D., ed. The Selected Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony, Volume V: Their Place Inside the Body-Politic, 1887 to 1895. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 2009. LC catalog record.

Gordon, Ann D., ed. The Selected Papers of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony, Volume VI: An Awful Hush, 1895 to 1906. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 2013. LC catalog record.

Harper, Ida Husted, ed. History of Woman Suffrage, Volumes 5-6, 1900-1920. New York: National American Woman Suffrage Association. LC catalog record. New York: Arno Press, 1969. LC catalog record.

Langley, Winston E., and Vivian C. Fox, eds. Women's Rights in the United States: A Documentary History. Westport, Conn.: Greenwood Press, 1994. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady. The Bible and Church Degrade Women. Chicago: H. L. Green, [1892]. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady. Eighty Years and More: Reminiscences, 1815-1897. New York: European Publishing Company, 1898. LC catalog record; New York: Schocken Books, 1971. LC catalog record; Boston: Northeastern University Press, 1993. LC catalog record; Amherst, N.Y.: Humanity Books, 2002. LC catalog record. Available online through HathiTrust External.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady. Solitude of Self: Address Delivered by Mrs. Stanton Before the Committee of the Judiciary of the United States Congress, Monday, January 18, 1892. Washington: Government Printing Office, 1915. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady. The Woman's Bible. New York: European Publishing Company, 1898. LC catalog record; New York, Arno Press, 1972. LC catalog record; Boston: Northeastern University Press, 1993. LC catalog record; Mineola, N.Y.: Dover Publications, 2002. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady, Susan B. Anthony, and Matilda Joslyn Gage, eds. History of Woman Suffrage, Volume 1, 1848-1861. New York: Fowler & Wells, 1881. LC catalog record. 2nd edition. Rochester, N.Y.: Susan B. Anthony (Charles Mann Press), 1889. LC catalog record. New York: Arno Press, 1969. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady, Susan B. Anthony, and Matilda Joslyn Gage, eds. History of Woman Suffrage, Volume 2, 1861-1876. New York: Fowler & Wells, 1882. LC catalog record. Rochester, N.Y.: Susan B. Anthony (Charles Mann Press), 1889. LC catalog record. New York: Arno Press, 1969. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Elizabeth Cady, Susan B. Anthony, and Matilda Joslyn Gage, eds. History of Woman Suffrage, Volume 3, 1876-1885. New York: Fowler & Wells, 1885. LC catalog record. 2nd edition. Rochester, N.Y.: Susan B. Anthony (Charles Mann Press), 1889. LC catalog record. New York: Arno Press, 1969. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Henry Brewster. Random Recollections. New York: Harper and Brothers, 1887. LC catalog record.

Stanton, Theodore, and Harriot Stanton Blatch, eds. Elizabeth Cady Stanton As Revealed in Her Letters, Diary, and Reminiscences. 2 vols. New York and London, Harper & Brothers [1922]. LC catalog record; New York: Arno & The New York Times, 1969. LC catalog record.

Selected Biographies, Histories, and Other Related Works

Anthony, Katharine. Susan B. Anthony: Her Personal History and Her Era. [1st ed.]. Garden City, N.Y.: Doubleday, 1954. LC catalog record.

Baker, Jean H. Sisters: The Lives of America's Suffragists. New York: Hill and Wang, 2005. LC catalog record.

Baker, Jean H., ed. Votes for Women: The Struggle for Suffrage Revisited. New York: Oxford University Press, 2002. LC catalog record.

Barry, Kathleen. Susan B. Anthony: A Biography of a Singular Feminist. New York: New York University Press, 1988. LC catalog record.

Basch, Norma. In the Eyes of the Law: Women, Marriage, and Property in Nineteenth-Century New York. Ithaca: Cornell University Press, 1982. LC catalog record.

Bausum, Ann. With Courage and Cloth: Winning the Fight for a Woman's Right to Vote. Washington, D.C.: National Geographic, 2004. LC catalog record.

Beck, Leonard N. "The Library of Susan B. Anthony." Quarterly Journal of the Library of Congress 32 (October 1975): 324-35. Available online through HathiTrust External.

DuBois, Ellen Carol. Harriot Stanton Blatch and the Winning of Suffrage. New Haven: Yale University Press, 1997. LC catalog record.

DuBois, Ellen Carol. Woman Suffrage and Women's Rights. New York: New York University Press, 1998. LC catalog record.

DuBois, Ellen Carol, and Candida-Smith, Richard, eds. Elizabeth Cady Stanton: Feminist as Thinker. New York: New York University Press, 2007. LC catalog record.

Gurko, Miriam. The Ladies of Seneca Falls: The Birth of the Women's Rights Movement. New York: Macmillan, [1974]. LC catalog record.

Gustafson, Melanie Susan. Women and the Republican Party, 1854-1924. Urbana: University of Illinois Press, 2001. LC catalog record.

Harper, Ida. Life and Work of Susan B. Anthony. 3 vols. Indianapolis and Kansas City: The Bowen-Merrill Company, 1898-1908. LC catalog record.

Isenberg, Nancy. Sex and Citizenship in Antebellum America. Chapel Hill: University of North Carolina, 1998. LC catalog record.

Kerr, Andrea Moore. Lucy Stone: Speaking Out for Equality. New Brunswick, N.J.: Rutgers University Press, 1992. LC catalog record.

Klein, Milton M., ed. The Empire State: A History of New York. Ithaca, N.Y.: Cornell University Press, 2001. LC catalog record.

Lutz, Alma. Challenging Years: The Memoirs of Harriot Stanton Blatch. New York: Putnam's, 1940. LC catalog record.

Norgren, Jill. Belva Lockwood: The Woman Who Would Be President. New York: New York University Press, 2007. LC catalog record.

Painter, Nell. Sojourner Truth: A Life, a Symbol. New York: W. W. Norton & Company, 1996. LC catalog record.

Passet, Joanne Ellen. Sex Radicals and the Quest for Women's Equality. Urbana: University of Illinois Press, 2003. LC catalog record.

Pellauer, Mary D. Toward a Tradition of Feminist Thought of Elizabeth Cady Stanton, Susan B. Anthony, and Anna Howard Shaw. Brooklyn, N.Y.: Carlson Publishing, 1991. LC catalog record.

Ruth, Janice E., and Evelyn Sinclair. Women Who Dare: Women of the Suffrage Movement. San Francisco: Pomegranate; Washington, D.C.: Library of Congress, 2006. LC catalog record.

Salerno, Beth A. Sister Societies: Women's Antislavery Organizations in Antebellum America. DeKalb: Northern Illinois University Press, 2005. LC catalog record.

Scherr, Lynn. Failure Is Impossible: Susan B. Anthony in Her Own Words. New York: Times Books, 1995. LC catalog record.

Scherr, Lynn. The Trial of Susan B. Anthony. Amherst, N.Y.: Humanity Books, 2003. LC catalog record.

Sneider, Allison L. Suffragists in an Imperial Age: U.S. Expansion and the Woman Question, 1870-1929. New York: Oxford University Press, 2008. LC catalog record.

Tetrault, Lisa. The Myth of Seneca Falls: Memory and the Women's Suffrage Movement, 1848-1898. Chapel Hill: University of North Carolina Press, 2014. LC catalog record.

Venet, Wendy Hamand. Neither Ballots Nor Bullets: Women Abolitionists and the Civil War. Charlottesville: University Press of Virginia, 1991. LC catalog record.

Ward, Geoffrey C., with essays by Martha Saxton, Ann D. Gordon, and Ellen Carol DuBois. Not for Ourselves Alone: The Story of Elizabeth Cady Stanton and Susan B. Anthony. New York: Alfred Knopf, 1999. LC catalog record.

Wheeler, Marjorie, ed. One Woman, One Vote: Rediscovering the Woman Suffrage Movement. Troutdale, Ore.: New Sage Press, 1995. LC catalog record.
